channel.title: Windows Media on Damien Saunders
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Media on Damien Saunders

item.title: Whats your media player?
item.description: I’m starting a reader survey on Media Players – as there are a few assumptions I wanted to prove or understand. If you have an iPod, iPhone or iTouch you use iTunes You use Winamp casue you don’t want to use iTunes or WMP you use windows media player as its the only thing you know or its the only one on your PC / Laptop
